title: On Day or Night
details: As much as possible Night, much more expensive but I think better overall so it isn't hot af. Moreover, we haven't tried to have a night swimming.

title: Cottage
details: Better to get the Small Upper Casitas that can house 15 people, extra person have additional Php 50. But if ever we can definitely have a bigger cottage if need be, this is just the best option we have.

title: Food
details: This needs more planning as I don't know what the fck everyone wants to eat but I made an estimate budget for the food. No plans yet if ever we we're to pick this option for swimming.

title: Other Notes
details: This plan was bumped up to Plan A as Batangas isn't really an option anymore. I'll add more notes as we can all decide that this will be the best option for swimming.
